name: Church Underground Casino
description: A large illegal underground casino hidden beneath the church. It serves as a major black-market hub and meeting point for the local mafia, sharply contrasting with the sacred silence above.

snapshot.name: The Underground Casino Beneath the Church
snapshot.location: Beneath the church, accessed through a hidden passage
snapshot.description: Hidden beneath the church is a vast, dimly lit underground casino. The air is thick with smoke and noise, filled with shouting gamblers, stacked gambling tables, and constant movement. Lookouts may be stationed near the entrance. The atmosphere is tense and hostile toward intruders, especially those without permission. This location is controlled by the local mafia and serves as an operational base rather than mere entertainment.

characters.name: Ben Cleo
characters.notes: The leader of the local mafia. Ben Cleo will stop hostilities if he arrives and may propose cooperation to the investigators.

characters.name: Covent
characters.notes: The person in charge on site. He will immediately attack investigators who enter without permission.

characters.name: Tallinn
characters.notes: Appears here once investigators have aligned with Ben Cleo.

characters.name: Lookouts
characters.notes: Stationed near the entrance to warn against or intercept intruders.

snapshot.keeperNotes: This location should feel dangerous and overwhelming. The casino reinforces the theme that Cassandra's institutions are deeply corrupted. Ben Cleo can act as a temporary ally, but the mafia remains morally ambiguous and self-interested.
